reviewText: I have a background in dance as I did ballet for a number of years.  This is definitely a dance game.  You get these small stars on the screen when you're doing things particularly well, and it says "HOT!", etc on the side, and it's very encouraging, even for those that have 2 left feet.This dance game is great for cardio burns rather than the usual boring workout dvds and awful dances that fitness trainers do as these are real dancers who are your teachers & it's choreographed by real working dancers.I would suggest getting this game along withJust Dance 2014 - Xbox Onewhich we also have & is a fun party game as well as a great dance game with amazing costumes.The difference betweenJust Dance 2014 - Xbox One& this is that there are really beautiful costumes on the other one & hilarious dance moves.  OnZumba Fitness World Party - Xbox Oneyou have actual faces of different and diverse dancers, and, I would say more of a dance class energy to it.I see that at the moment you can buy both here, or conversely you can download it to your xbox oneXbox One Consoleonline & not bother with buying the actual discs.Bottom line:  this is way better to burn cardio than any boring repetitive disc out there.  Every day you can dance to something different (this applies to both games).  And, honestly, it will make you feel happy.  I do it throughout the day, just one song and I get an immediate happy feeling.  Again this applies to both games.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Used this at my granddaughter's house for exercise.  Very effective and you use the latest dance moves.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I purchased this product because I had Zumba for my Xbox 360. I have lost 50-lbs by doing Zumba and my treadmill for walking/running. You can tailor a program to fit your needs. For example, if the short course is too intense, you can complete one song at a time until you progress to the point where you can use one of the "premade" classes. I ma currently doing two mid-length programs back-to-back...a total of 30-songs, 80-minutes of exercise. The graphics for this next generation program is outstanding. There are songs from all around the world, as with the trainers you follow. You can go at your own pace OR really cut loose, your choice.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I don't really get the Kinect... but my wife and daughter love it and my wife especially loves dancing games and she absolutely loves this one.  She noted that it is better than the old 360 Kinect as well, so there have been some improvements to the Kinect's abilities.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Zumba is a fantastic game for those who want to have a variety of music and culture in their dancing game, and a fun one to boot. It's a bit more forgiving than Just Dance 2014, so when you hear the music and see the dance patterns it usually gives credit where credit is due, unless you aren't moving of course.
